name: Devinica
description:
Deviniva is a first-person retro shooter set in a dystopian nonsensical city. Play through five levels set in apartments and warehouses and fight different enemies.

Features



Timed level runs: Start, Run, Die, Start again. Your best time is saved.

Collectables: Find items hidden in the world to unlock a bonus game-mode.

Rat Hacking: Hack into rats to access secret areas and scout ahead.

Advanced Movement: Jump, Dash and hover your way through levels.




A FREE postlaunch DLC missionpack is planned.
